name: unconventionally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is different from what is usually done or believed: The documentary takes a look at the good and bad sides of growing up unconventionally. an unconventionally handsome actor See
unconventional
More examplesFewer examplesThe school district has been willing to think unconventionally about her son's needs.Unconventionally attractive, Collette has a remarkably expressive face.The book is organized usefully if unconventionally.
